title: Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao chroma not in shop?
body: I bought warring kingdoms xin zhao on august 24 and i woke up the next morning to see that warring kingdoms xin zhao chroma is not in the chroma pack section and i bought the skin so i can get the chroma with ip. Is the chroma skins going to be for sale with ip?

replies.body: Warring Kindoms Xin Zhao chroma pack should be available in the store now!  Keep in mind that the new chroma skins will not be available for IP per our[ chroma pack](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204475264-Chromas-Packs-FAQ) faq.  Let me know if you have any issues seeing him, though!
hmmm the OLD chromas are the ones which are getting to be sold for IP, the new ones... nope, buy them with IP
